import React, { useState } from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import { DateRange } from 'react-date-range'; import format from 'date-fns/format'; const HotelsList = () => { const [openCalendar, setOpenCalendar] = useState(false); const [dates, setDates] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection', } ]); return ( <>

{openCalendar && setDates([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={dates} className="date" minDate={new Date()} locale={locales['zhTW']} />}
